head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths OKORO, JOHN E.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths OKORO, JOHN E.

block.p: OKORO--John E. 1960-2004. 44 years old. The entire family of the late Mazi Joseph Onyeabor Okoro of Ndi Ajuwa at Amiyi Ahaba Imenyi in Isuikwuato LGA of Abia State Nigeria, regretfully announce the sudden and untimely death of their son, husband, father, brother, nephew, uncle and cousin. John E. Okoro, which sad event took place at Bronx Terminal Market. John E. Okoro was the owner of African Market #

OKORO--John E. 1960-2004. 44 years old. The entire family of the late Mazi Joseph Onyeabor Okoro of Ndi Ajuwa at Amiyi Ahaba Imenyi in Isuikwuato LGA of Abia State Nigeria, regretfully announce the sudden and untimely death of their son, husband, father, brother, nephew, uncle and cousin. John E. Okoro, which sad event took place at Bronx Terminal Market. John E. Okoro was the owner of African Market #
